commit message: Added support for unsigned HTTPS certificates. Increased the size of the font on the ViewAccountDetails activity.
Added a context menu to the accounts list
Use an AsyncTask rather than a simple thread for decrypting the database. No particular reason other than consistency with similar code elsewhere in the app.
When resuming FullAccountList ensure that the PasswordDatabase is not null. If it is finish the activity. This will resume AppEntryActivity which will reopen the database.
Reverting changes related to trusting all certificates added in revision 256.
Added 'Import Certificate' feature. If a certificate has been imported and the remote database is on a HTTPS URL this imported certificate is used to build an SSLFactory.

Added a new preference, Trusted Hostname

If your remote database is hosted on a shared host and you're using HTTPS it's likely that the Certificate provided by your hosting provider will not have your website URL as the Common Name (it'll probably be some generic name shared by all domains hosted on that server). Android will reject the certificate on that basis. By entering your hostname in this field you're telling UPM to trust it.
Improved toast message when account has no URL
Updated manifest and release notes for 1.2 release
